metadata.title: Katov - Creative Website Services
metadata.description: Katov - Creative and professional website development services in Uzbekistan. Minimal design, maximum impact.

hero.description: Minimal design. Maximum impact. We help your brand stand out in the online world.

about.title: Who is KATOV?
about.description: KATOV is a studio that creates creative and reliable web solutions. We build websites not just for looks, but for results.
about.description2: Every project is focused on clear goals, understandable structure, and real results. We combine design tailored to your business, modern technologies, and convenient management.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: What can we do?
services.description: We offer the most modern and creative solutions for your business.
